description: Standardized semantic taxonomy for method classification in the congruence layer

coherence.description: Methods that assess logical consistency, contradiction detection, or semantic alignment across text segments

numerical.description: Methods that process, extract, or validate numerical data, statistics, or quantitative claims

temporal.description: Methods that handle time-based information, temporal ordering, or chronological analysis

causal.description: Methods that identify, infer, or validate causal relationships, mechanisms, or dependencies

structural.description: Methods that analyze document structure, hierarchies, or organizational patterns

policy.description: Methods that interpret policy-specific content, objectives, or domain knowledge

evidence.description: Methods that handle evidence collection, assessment, or probative value determination

textual_quality.description: Methods that assess text quality, readability, completeness, or linguistic properties

tag_combinations.description: Common combinations of tags that frequently appear together

patterns.use_case: Text quality assessment with coherence validation

changelog.changes: Initial semantic taxonomy with 8 core tags
